â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Battles                                                                 â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Improved enemy AI, incorporating tactics and formations add a new       â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ dimension to battles. Shock troops such as the Berserkir fight like     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ animals but in the heat of battle may not distinguish friend from foe.  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Kingdom Improvements                                                    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Customise your kingdom's colour, ransom prisoners to the enemy and      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ raise your peasants as a levy army in times of need.                    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Expanded Multiplayer                                                    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ New scenes and Raid game mode. Improvements to the UI and additional    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ options for server admins to take control of the invaders in Invasion   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ mode.                                                                   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ More Immersion                                                          â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Special player traits and the ability to spread rumours to influence    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ people throughout the land. More lively scenes with domestic animals    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ walking around. Extra information about your companions and the option  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ of a second player outfit for use outside of battle, as well as much    â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ more roleplay and many more immersive features.                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Customise Your Level of Difficulty and Goals                            â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Set your own goals to become an Infamous Raider, Strong King, Beloved   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Warrior and more. Customise your difficulty options to cater your own   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ experience and challenge.                                               â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ

â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ       Warband and Napoleonic Wars DLC content, all of course fully      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ       updated to the latest build!                                      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ                                                                         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
